Reviews.Title: Great phone but.......
Reviews.Author: K "Metal head"
Reviews.Content: The phone came 23 days after order but that's what I expected. The phone is lightning fast and after deleting the Chinese apps it was great. But all I was able to do was via wifi. It seems the phone had a defective receiver I'm not sure but the seller was very helpful in attempting to rectify the situation and then offered to refund my money. I am sending the phone back but I wish it had worked. I would try again but I can't wait for a new phone. If you have the time to wait I would try it out. The only difference is the phone was slightly thicker but it also has android jelly bean and a faster processor than the original. The batteries lasted all day but they were very irregular at displaying how much was left.  All in all I was very happy with it and I'm sure I'd keep it if it received a signal. I tested out calling using VoIP and it was clear. Basically for 200 dollars it was incredible but being sent from China most likely it was damaged in shipping.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: khiya
Reviews.Content: i got the phecda i 9300. its a great phone BUT does not work with cricket.so if you are with cricket do not get unless you are willing to switch to tmobile or net 10 or some other network that supports this phone.

Reviews.Title: it is advertised as being CDMA is not CDMA
Reviews.Author: Billy McFadden
Reviews.Content: The phone it's self is fine but if you looking for both CDMA and GSM this phone is not CDMA and will not run on Sprints network

Reviews.Title: Really good
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: It is fast and work with Tmobile I am no so sure with At & T but i'll tried it later, android apps work really good in this phone.

Reviews.Title: great phone eats up battery 2 hour talk time needs bigger battery
Reviews.Author: snobirdbjs
Reviews.Content: this is a really good phone but the battery is too small it has a 1800 mah and needs a 2500 mah to get a full days use. I have ordered a new 2500 mah battery using the # on the oem battery it came and was 1/8 in to big. its battery has the same # as a Samsung galxy s3 but there battery will not fit. I have searched the world on the net for 3 weeks only to find there is no replacement battery of any power offered for this phone. THE BATTERY PROBLEM IS THE ONLY REAL PROBLEM I CAN FIND THIS IS THE 6TH. ANDROID PHONE I HAVE OWNED. THANK GOD IT CAME WITH 2 BATTERIES

Reviews.Title: people
Reviews.Author: leach
Reviews.Content: it was bad it loses wi-fi and it is nothing like the gs3 the case can't even fit i have a gs4 now and sent it back and i got no money back

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: D. Scott
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a Large Screen Phone and this Phone is Awesome, it came with to 2 Batteries, ear bubs, a flip cover and a back cover. I can't say enough about this phone. It arrived earlier than was expected and that was Great and came in the Best Condition which is another Plus. It is still going Strong!

Reviews.Title: Nice.
Reviews.Author: larry white
Reviews.Content: Nice phone. Great duplicate. It is in no way a CDMA phone! Hard to update or change roms. Good for t-mobile or gsm providers.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Customer X
Reviews.Content: So I bought this thinking I could get it to work on Verizon, since it indicates it is also CDMA compatible and came up when I did a search on Verizon unlocked smartphones. However, I discovered it will not work on Verizon's network. So I ended up switching to Net10, but I think it will work on any GSM network requiring a SIM card. In general it is a very nice phone and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Android phone
Reviews.Author: Elle
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my husband for his bday.  He currently uses H2O wireless and there was some configuration needed to get that data working.  Fortunately, H2O has an app for that. ;)  The phone is superfast and he gets all bars on his data no matter where he is.  I don't get that and I have a legit phone with my company. lol.  He has no complaints other than finding a case that truly fits.  If anyone finds one, please let me know.  Otherwise, enjoy this phone. :)

Reviews.Title: very good phone
Reviews.Author: manuel
Reviews.Content: Very fast and good features. Performs like a samsung galaxy 3. Although hard to find case for the accessory connections.may be on the other side

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!!!! I may also get one for myself.
Reviews.Author: Y. Price "yo-yo"
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my son and it is wonderful. It is lightening fast and ever since he had it he has not been able to put it down.It took a little time for the phone to recognize his sim card and update at first. It works on the t-mobile network and takes wonderful pictures. It does everything you could want in a phone. You can talk and text, download music, stream videos, access the internet etc. The phone looks like the S3 and is well worth the money for under 200 bucks. An unlocked S3 practically cost an arm and a leg but this phone works just as good as the S3  but the only difference is the bottons are located on the right side of the phone. The only thing my son did not like about the phone is the checkbook case it came with.  The S3 cases will not fit this phone. Still looking for a case for the phone. Any suggestions?????

Reviews.Title: not received
Reviews.Author: keron trim
Reviews.Content: The item has not been received so i can't rate this item just yet but im sure as soon as i receive the item i will write a review

Reviews.Title: ANDROID PHONE
Reviews.Author: G. Yau "TY"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS PHONE, ALTHOUGH FIRST TIME TROUBLE TO BOOT UP BUT WORKING WELL AFTERTHE PHONE WAS FAST BUT SOME FUNCTION NOT VERY GOOD, THIS IS STILL A GOOD PHONE

Reviews.Title: Okay but not what I expected!
Reviews.Author: MsV
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for! Phones work okay but there are a few defects (very low volume, half of screen blacks out for incoming calls etc...) Seller was willing to issue full refund but it was inconvenient since I had already waited 2 weeks for it to arrive.

Reviews.Title: any a yall know??
Reviews.Author: zjmelton
Reviews.Content: Anybody know if this is sIII case compatible?? I wanted to get it but aint sure if it was just like the sIII so if anyone knows please tell me much obliged.

Reviews.Title: They have great customer serivce
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Well my phone was not working correctly when i got, it so i sent it back. The customer service contacted me as soon as i went through  the refund process and were very easy to work with. I think that the phone not working was just a fluke and since it came from Hong Kong. Overall i would of tried to get another phone from them but i had already got a new one.

Reviews.Title: Question
Reviews.Author: Travis
Reviews.Content: Thinking about buying but does anyone know if it works for straight Talk. I really want the Samsung Galaxy S3 and this is really close no?

Reviews.Title: Great phone but now 4.1.1 jellybean like it says
Reviews.Author: kenwood
Reviews.Content: all in all i have to say is that this is a great phone i got it in a week when it way suppose to get here in mid june so i got this phone a week ago to the day and i wanted to wait at least a week to play around with it to write this review i have net10 service on my phone and it works great the only thing is that i had another unlocked phone on net10 and had 3g it probably has to do with my apn settings so if anyone can help me with that would be great the one on net10's website does not work the only problem with this phone is that the battery life sux a little but hey they give you 2 batteries and its a smartphone so can't be that bad and the only other thing i didn't like is that it's not the jellybean firmware it will say4.1.1 on your phone but if you keep pressing it a android character will come up displaying that it is acually on the icecream sandwhich firmware and i want to thank NEWISLAND for sending me my phone really quick as well

Reviews.Title: Verizon?
Reviews.Author: Optimus Maximus Primus "Optimus Primus Maximus"
Reviews.Content: ok no one has seemed to ask or answer this question. Can this phone work on Verizon? I really would like to know for sure. Right now I am  40% sure it can only because Verizon now has there own sim cards andI know you can buy Google's Nexus 4 and take to Verizon and get a  free sim card to use however I think thats because the Nexus is 4g and the Verizon sim cards are 4g.This phone isn't 4g. Is there anyone out there that knows for sure if this phone or any phone like it will work on Verizon? I am really interested in this phone.

Reviews.Title: It's my worst decision...
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: This cell phone is a fraud. It turn of itself. It's like I have no cell phone. When it's turn on it's a good cell phone. But if you can't be sure that it will be turning on, you can't be sure that you can recieve some call.Really, I'll appreciate if anyone has the technical map of it because I live in Venezuela and this make me impossible return back de cell phone...PS: It has never felt down. I can proof that.

ProductInfo.Name: Phecda i 9300 MTK6577 Android 4.1.1 Smartphone  GSM+CDMA Dual Standby Quad Band with 4.6" Capacitive Screen and GPS (White)
